text: Sandipta Sen is a Bengali television actress. She is known for her role of Nandini in Tumi Asbe Bole. In 2014 she was awarded the Tele Academy Award for Best Actress for her role of Turpur in Tapur Tupur. ==TV Shows== Year Title Role Language Comments 2008 - 2010 Durga Durga Bengali aired in Star Jalsa 2011 - 2013 Tapur Tupur Tapur Chowdhury Bengali aired in Star Jalsa 2014 - 2016 Tumi Asbe Bole Nandini Deb Roy Bengali aired in Star Jalsa 2017 Pratidaan Shimul/Sheuli/Mrs.Braginza Bengali airs on Star Jalsa ==References== ==Other website== * Category:Living people Category:1987 births Category:Indian television actors
title: Sandipta Sen
